channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 印度海军参谋长：印度尚未通知其国防人员从马尔代夫撤军
item.description: India's government has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives following a request from Male, Indian Navy Chief Admiral R. Hari Kumar told broadcaster CNN-News 18 on Thursday.翻译:印度海军上将 R. Hari Kumar 周四对 CNN-News 18 广播公司表示，应马累的要求，印度政府尚未要求其国防人员从马尔代夫撤军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国市场在银行准备金削减后松一口气
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港最高法院推翻人权律师无罪释放
item.description: Hong Kong's top court on Thursday overturned the acquittal of activist and human rights lawyer Chow Hang Tung of inciting others to join an unauthorised vigil to remember victims of China's 1989 Tiananmen Square crackdown.翻译:香港最高法院周四推翻了对活动人士兼人权律师周恒东的无罪判决，该罪名是煽动他人参加未经授权的守夜活动，悼念中国 1989 年天安门广场镇压的受害者。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 随着季度出货量的增加，Fortescue 致力于清理在中国持有的铁矿石
item.description: Fortescue will work with Chinese authorities to resolve the delays keeping some of its iron ore cargoes from clearing customs, a company official said on Thursday.翻译:公司官员周四表示，Fortescue 将与中国当局合作，解决部分铁矿石货物无法清关的延误问题。
item.author: Melanie Burton, Rishav Chatterjee

item.title: 随着华为市场份额的增长，苹果第四季度 iPhone 在中国的出货量下降 2%
item.description: Apple's smartphone shipments in China shrank 2.1% in the final quarter of 2023 from the same year-ago period, hurt by intensifying competition from local rivals led by Huawei, data from research firm IDC showed on Thursday.翻译:研究公司IDC周四的数据显示，由于以华为为首的本土竞争对手的竞争加剧，苹果2023年第四季度在中国的智能手机出货量较去年同期下降了2.1%。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 日本商界领袖返回中国寻求加强合作
item.description: An unusually large delegation of about 200 Japanese business leaders arrived in China this week to bolster economic relations in the first such visit in more than four years and in the face of geopolitical headwinds that have strained bilateral ties.翻译:一个由约 200 名日本商界领袖组成的庞大代表团本周抵达中国，以加强经济关系，这是四年多来的首次此类访问，而且面临着令双边关系紧张的地缘政治逆风。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官马斯克：中国电动汽车公司将在没有贸易壁垒的情况下“摧毁”竞争对手
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday Chinese automakers will "demolish" global rivals without trade barriers, underscoring the heat the U.S. electric vehicle market leader faces from the likes of BYD, who are racing to expand worldwide.翻译:特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克周三表示，中国汽车制造商将在没有贸易壁垒的情况下“摧毁”全球竞争对手，突显了这家美国电动汽车市场领导者面临着来自比亚迪等公司的压力，比亚迪等公司正在竞相向全球扩张。
item.author: Abhirup Roy

item.title: 台湾当选总统表示希望美国继续坚定支持
item.description: Taiwan president-elect Lai Ching-te said on Thursday he hopes that the United States can continue to firmly support Taiwan, as he met the first group of U.S. lawmakers to visit Taipei since he won an election earlier this month.翻译:台湾当选总统赖清德周四表示，他希望美国能够继续坚定支持台湾，因为他会见了自本月早些时候赢得选举以来第一批访问台北的美国议员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受股市打击，中国人涌入被禁比特币
item.description: More and more Chinese investors are using creative ways to own bitcoin and other crypto assets that they believe are safer than investing in crumbling stock and property markets at home.翻译:越来越多的中国投资者正在使用创造性的方式来拥有比特币和其他加密资产，他们认为这些资产比投资于摇摇欲坠的国内股票和房地产市场更安全。
item.author: Vidya Ranganathan, Summer Zhen

item.title: 中国军方称美国驱逐舰在台海“炒作”通过
item.description: China's military said it organized troops to follow and monitor a U.S. destroyer that transited through the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, according to a statement.翻译:一份声明称，中国军方表示，已组织部队对周三通过台湾海峡的一艘美国驱逐舰进行跟踪监视。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音737 MAX返回中国
item.description: Boeing was set to deliver its first 737 MAX to a Chinese airline since March 2019 on Wednesday, flight data shows, ending a four-year freeze for the U.S. planemaker's most profitable jet.翻译:飞行数据显示，波音将于周三向一家中国航空公司交付自 2019 年 3 月以来的首架 737 MAX，结束这家美国飞机制造商最赚钱的喷气式飞机四年来的冻结。
item.author: Valerie Insinna

item.title: 美国大选后派出第一艘军舰通过台湾海峡
item.description: The U.S. Navy said the destroyer USS John Finn transited through a corridor in the Taiwan Strait that was "beyond the territorial sea of any coastal state".翻译:美国海军表示，约翰·芬恩号驱逐舰穿过台湾海峡的一条走廊，该走廊“超出任何沿海国家的领海”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国江西省商店火灾造成39人死亡、多人被困
item.description: A fire at a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped.翻译:中国官方媒体和当地政府周三表示，江西省新余市一家街边商店发生火灾，已造成 39 人死亡、9 人受伤，并补充说仍有一些人被困。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与乌兹别克斯坦建立更紧密的联系，推动铁路路线绕过俄罗斯
item.description: China on Wednesday upgraded its diplomatic ties with Uzbekistan and offered closer cooperation across a range of projects, including a Central Asia railway that would open up a new trade route as shippers shun an existing overland link via Russia.翻译:中国周三升级了与乌兹别克斯坦的外交关系，并在一系列项目上提供了更密切的合作，其中包括一条中亚铁路，该铁路将开辟一条新的贸易路线，因为托运人将避开经由俄罗斯的现有陆路连接。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 锡因过剩而受到束缚，但绿色工业需求有望消除供应
item.description: The potential for a build-up of tin supplies this year is likely to put pressure on prices, but accelerating demand from the energy transition sector, including solar panels and electric vehicles, should support prices in the future.翻译:今年锡供应量增加的可能性可能会给价格带来压力，但太阳能电池板和电动汽车等能源转型行业需求的加速增长应该会支撑未来的价格。
item.author: Pratima Desai

item.title: 印度必须批准 GIFT City 与邻国投资者的上市
item.description: Indian government approval will be needed if a local company with shareholders from neighbouring countries such as China wants to list on exchanges registered in a new financial hub, according to rules issued on Wednesday.翻译:根据周三发布的规定，如果一家拥有中国等邻国股东的当地公司想要在新金融中心注册的交易所上市，则需要获得印度政府的批准。
item.author: Nikunj Ohri, Jayshree Pyasi

item.title: 早盘竞价：提振对脆弱中国的信心
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Dhara Ranasinghe翻译:达拉·拉纳辛格 (Dhara Ranasinghe) 展望美国和全球市场未来一天
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 郑爽击败卡林斯卡娅晋级澳网半决赛
item.description: Zheng Qinwen shook off a sluggish start to outclass Russian Anna Kalinskaya 6-7(4) 6-3 6-1 on Wednesday and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time where the Chinese 12th seed will take on Ukrainian qualifier Dayana Yastremska.翻译:周三，郑钦文一改开局不利的局面，以6-7(4) 6-3 6-1击败俄罗斯选手安娜·卡林斯卡娅，首次进入澳网半决赛，中国12号种子将迎战乌克兰预选赛选手达亚娜·亚斯特雷姆斯卡。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 兹维列夫闯入澳网半决赛，阿尔卡拉斯无路可逃
item.description: Alexander Zverev served up a huge shock at the Australian Open on Wednesday by stunning second seed Carlos Alcaraz to make the semi-finals after third seed Daniil Medvedev fought hard to avoid an upset at the hands of Hubert Hurkacz.翻译:周三，亚历山大·兹维列夫在澳大利亚网球公开赛上给二号种子卡洛斯·阿尔卡拉斯带来了巨大冲击，三号种子丹尼尔·梅德韦杰夫奋力拼搏，避免被休伯特·胡尔卡茨爆冷，进入半决赛。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 美国原油大量撤离和中国刺激措施推动油价小幅上涨 1%
item.description: Oil prices edged up about 1% on Wednesday on a bigger-than-expected U.S. crude storage withdrawal, a slump in U.S. crude output, Chinese economic stimulus, geopolitical tensions and a weaker dollar.翻译:由于美国原油库存撤出规模超出预期、美国原油产量下滑、中国经济刺激、地缘政治紧张局势以及美元疲软，周三油价小幅上涨约 1%。
item.author: Scott Disavino
